titleStmt.title: Two orientall pearles, grace and glory, published by Mr. Zacharie Boyd, preacher of Gods word, at Glasgovv
titleStmt.author: Boyd, Zacharie, 1585?-1653.

notesStmt.note: Three sermons, on Psalm lxxii, 24, 25, and 26.
Title from British Library copy (beginning-page 15 spliced at end of film).
Imperfect: Title page and all after page following page 50 lacking.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Edinburgh Library.
